statements.select:
select ReportId,Id,CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,DataSource,RequisitionId,EvaluatedName,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3,ReportCode,DoStatus,LastReportId,AssessType,Assessor,AssessmentUnit,AssessmentCall,AssessmentScores,ServeItemType,CommunityRemark,CommunityTime ,StreetExamine,StreetExamineTime,CityAudit,CityAuditTime,AssessLevel,ServiceBeginTime,ServiceEndTime,CommunityCheck,CommunityChecker,StreetExaminer,CityApproval,PrintNo,OcaResult,PamResult,DccResult,ServiceSubsidies, (select top 1 FlowFrom from pub_flow where eva.ReportId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowFrom, (select top 1 FlowTo from pub_flow where eva.ReportId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowTo, dbo.FUNC_Pub_GetFlowDefineActionName2(ReportId,'EvaluatedReport',AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3) ActionName from Eva_EvaluatedReport eva
ReportId=#ReportId# Id=#Id# CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DataSource=#DataSource# RequisitionId=#RequisitionId# EvaluatedName=#EvaluatedName# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# ReportCode=#ReportCode# DoStatus=#DoStatus# LastReportId=#LastReportId# AssessType=#AssessType# Assessor=#Assessor# AssessmentUnit=#AssessmentUnit# AssessmentCall=#AssessmentCall# AssessmentScores=#AssessmentScores# ServeItemType=#ServeItemType# CommunityRemark=#CommunityRemark# CommunityTime>=to_date(#CommunityTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CommunityTime<=to_date(#CommunityTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') StreetExamine=#StreetExamine# StreetExamineTime>=to_date(#StreetExamineTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') StreetExamineTime<=to_date(#StreetExamineTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CityAudit=#CityAudit# CityAuditTime>=to_date(#CityAuditTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CityAuditTime<=to_date(#CityAuditTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AssessLevel=#AssessLevel# ServiceBeginTime>=to_date(#ServiceBeginTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceBeginTime<=to_date(#ServiceBeginTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceEndTime>=to_date(#ServiceEndTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceEndTime<=to_date(#ServiceEndTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CommunityCheck=#CommunityCheck# CommunityChecker=#CommunityChecker# StreetExaminer=#StreetExaminer# CityApproval=#CityApproval# PrintNo=#PrintNo# OcaResult=#OcaResult# PamResult=#PamResult# DccResult=#DccResult# ServiceSubsidies=#ServiceSubsidies# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select 1 as NoUse from ( select ReportId,Id,CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,DataSource,RequisitionId,EvaluatedName,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3, ReportCode,DoStatus,LastReportId,AssessType,Assessor,AssessmentUnit,AssessmentCall,AssessmentScores,ServeItemType, CommunityRemark,CommunityTime ,StreetExamine,StreetExamineTime,CityAudit,CityAuditTime,AssessLevel,AssessmentResult,ServiceBeginTime, ServiceEndTime,OcaResult,PamResult,DccResult,CommunityCheck,CommunityChecker,StreetExaminer,CityApproval,PrintNo, dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('12001',eva.AssessType) AssessTypeName, dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('12002',eva.ServeItemType)ServeItemTypeName, dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('12008',eva.AssessLevel)AssessLevelName, (select top 1 FlowFrom from pub_flow where eva.ReportId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowFrom, (select top 1 FlowTo from pub_flow where eva.ReportId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowTo, dbo.FUNC_Pub_GetFlowDefineActionName2(ReportId,'EvaluatedReport',AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3) ActionName from Eva_EvaluatedReport eva
ReportId=#ReportId# Id=#Id# CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DataSource=#DataSource# RequisitionId=#RequisitionId# EvaluatedName=#EvaluatedName# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# ReportCode=#ReportCode# DoStatus=#DoStatus# LastReportId=#LastReportId# AssessType=#AssessType# Assessor=#Assessor# AssessmentUnit=#AssessmentUnit# AssessmentCall=#AssessmentCall# AssessmentScores=#AssessmentScores# ServeItemType=#ServeItemType# CommunityRemark=#CommunityRemark# CommunityTime>=to_date(#CommunityTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CommunityTime<=to_date(#CommunityTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') StreetExamine=#StreetExamine# StreetExamineTime>=to_date(#StreetExamineTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') StreetExamineTime<=to_date(#StreetExamineTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CityAudit=#CityAudit# CityAuditTime>=to_date(#CityAuditTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CityAuditTime<=to_date(#CityAuditTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AssessLevel=#AssessLevel# ServiceBeginTime>=to_date(#ServiceBeginTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceBeginTime<=to_date(#ServiceBeginTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceEndTime>=to_date(#ServiceEndTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ServiceEndTime<=to_date(#ServiceEndTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CommunityCheck=#CommunityCheck# CommunityChecker=#CommunityChecker# StreetExaminer=#StreetExaminer# CityApproval=#CityApproval# PrintNo=#PrintNo# $WhereClause$
) n
FlowFrom=#FlowFrom# FlowTo=#FlowTo# FlowFrom!=#NonFlowFrom# or FlowFrom is null $WhereClause2$
